name: Holiday Inn Express Albany-Western Ave University

reviews.text: After a long day of driving, this hotel was an oasis of comfort. The staff at the front desk were
reviews.title: A superb Holiday Inn - comfort all the way!

reviews.text: efficient, quick, with an appropriate sense of humor. The rooms (2) were spotless and the beds were wonderfully comfortable. A good sized fridge and microwave were in the room.
reviews.title: Excellent Hotel, great staff

reviews.text: Guest toiletries and towels were generously supplied which was appreciated. The staff's recommendation to eat at the restaurant 99 was ideal. The breakfast was fabulous and
reviews.title: Good value, good service, empty pool and gym for our use!!

reviews.text: suitable for this diabetic. Well done everyone and thank you.
reviews.title: So great

reviews.text: I sm staying in this hotel for almost 1 year for my business trips. And finally by way of this review I wanted to thank and appreciate the services and staff of this hotel.
reviews.title: Very nice!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We were passing through on our way to Rochester. We stayed one night. We had requested a quiet room, which was granted. We were far from elevators and ice machines. Breakfast was decent for a place like this. Definitely better than other HIEs we've stayed in. I would stay here again.
reviews.title: we enjoyed our stay here

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I gave this 5 stars due to the fact that it far surpassed any other Holiday Inn Express I have visited. Pride of ownership was clear in every aspect of my stay here. As we pulled into the hotel, we noticed the perfectly manicured garden in front of the lobby check in area. The parking lot was spotlessly clean. There was a weber grill with small tables for the hotel guests in the rear parking lot. The check in attendant was friendly and efficient. The room was clean and the decor modern and well maintained. I normally don't eat the breakfast and cannot comment on that. When we left in the morning, a maintenance worker was painting the curbs with fresh paint in the parking lot. It seems like every detail is attended to in this hotel and the love and care of the owners shows.
reviews.title: A Gem in the Holiday Inn Express chain

reviews.text: We spent 1 night here - we arrived late around 9:30pm after driving from Toronto and visiting Cooperstown on our way to Boston. The girl at the front desk was great and even kept the pool open a bit later so the boys (11 & 7) could burn off some energy from being in a car for hours. The pool was warm and shallow which is great for kids and the pool area was really clean and nice. The pool area did not smell like chlorine which was also good. The room was very clean a bit of paint chipped off here and there but super clean. There was a microwave and a fridge in the room - also clean and the 2 beds were big although a bit soft - my hubby's back hurt in the am. Lots of pillows also a bonus. Big TV. Breakfast was fantastic - hot and cold options and a Pancake Machine - The Best for picky kids!!!!! In overview I would stay here again.
reviews.title: Perfect for us!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: On our way east, this recommended facility provided everything we needed. Enough said.
reviews.title: Quality hospitality on the road

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We lucked upon this hotel, but were impressed by the helpfulness of the staff and the wonderful full, complimentary breakfast. Free WiFi. The a/c didn't work when we arrived but it was fixed by the time we got back from dinner.
reviews.title: Close to University
Comfortable Stay
reviews.text: Our family of 5 (3 kids ages 13, 11 and 10) spent a night here on our road trip to western NY. The hotel is conveniently located near the highway and a short drive from downtown. We typically reserve 2 adjoining rooms, 1 with a king and 1 with 2 doubles. This hotel does not have that configuration and the first rooms they sent us to were not connecting rooms. The staff remedied the situation, giving us two adjoining double rooms.

The kids used the pool which is small, but sufficient for kids but would not really accomodate someone swimming laps. There is no hot tub but lots of chairs for lounging while you watch the kids. We did not use the small exercise room but noted that it had a couple of treadmills, a bike, an elliptical, a small bench and dumbbells up to 30 pounds.
reviews.title: This hotel sold our family on Holiday Inn Express

reviews.text: The rooms were spacious and clean, the bathrooms particularly so. We were pleasantly surprised to have an inroom safe and refrigerator as well as 2 complimentary bottles of water in each room.
reviews.title: Perfect for Families

reviews.text: We did partake of the complimentary breakfast, but I would opt to go out next time - a personal preference for more local flavor than a knock against the hotel's breakfast options.
reviews.title: Clean hotel with very nice employees

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: All told, I can recommend this hotel as a good value, comfortable, conveniently located and safe.
reviews.title: 5 Stars all the way!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This inn has all the facilities that we expect to find when we are traveling and then some. In particular, we appreciate high speed internet, fitness center, laundromat, buffet breakfast, refrigerator and a ground floor room close to our parking space. Particular attention to detail is obvious here because we had our needs anticipated in advance and had no complaints during our stay.
reviews.title: CLEAN, COMFORTABLE, QUIET ACCOMODATIONS FOR ROAD WARRIORS

reviews.text: There was a problem in the laundromat. When brought to the staff's attention, it was promptly fixed. The staff was courteous, professional and helpful during our stay.
reviews.title: Best Place to Stay for the Money

reviews.text: When in the area again, we will probably stay here.
reviews.title: Always A Good Stay

reviews.text: WOW.... I was blown away at the service you get at this Hotel as well as the rooms being so big, VERY clean, and very up to date. You can tell that they weren't cheap building this one!
reviews.title: Great place!
Excellent Service at all levels
reviews.text: Great breakfast Buffet, pool and excersise room. I have to come to Albany often for my job and will only stay here !!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: If there were a 4 1/2 I'd up this property by another 1/2 a circle. The housekeeping was excellent, the usual HIE breakfast had a bit more variety than many others, the breakfast space was lighter, airier and had a bit more space between the tables. Our room was up to normal HIE standards and very clean. The room included microwave, refrigerator, and coffee maker, and the refrigerator included a small freezer section, which is not always the case.
reviews.title: A Very Good HIE

reviews.text: Unlike a number of HIEs we've stayed in, this one did have a guest laundry, which we find useful when travelling for longer periods.
reviews.title: Very nice Holiday Inn, good choice for Albany

reviews.text: All staff we encountered were pleasant and helpful.
reviews.title: very nice and not too expensive hotel
Very good location, clean new hotel
reviews.text: The only fault was that, although our reservation clearly stated we'd reserved a king bed room, we were first sent to a two queen room, but when we called down to the front desk a key to a king bed room was sent up to us, with apologies and an offer to help us move our luggage, which wasn't necessary as we'd never taken it off the cart. When we got to the new room someone from the front desk was there to apologize again and check that everything was okay. A shame that an error was made, but the staff acquitted themselves well by correcting it efficiently and apologizing. We would not hesitate to stay at this hotel again.
Only negative that comes to mind
reviews.title: Clean, quiet, comfortable, nice breakfast !

reviews.text: We stayed at this Holiday Inn Express and were very pleased with our stay. Our stay began with being greeted warmly by the front desk staff. The staff person was both friendly & knowledgeable. We needed to ask for directions to a restaurant about 20 minutes away & he was very helpful.
reviews.title: Great Place To Stay

reviews.text: We checked out our room and it was in excellent condition. The furnishings were up-to-date and the room was immaculate. The bathroom was modern & also extremely clean. Nice large, flat screen tv in the room as well.
reviews.title: Clean rooms, polite staff, breakfast & pool .... Great Place!

reviews.text: We chose a room with 2 queen beds since there were 4 of us staying for 2 nights. 3 of the 4 in our group felt the beds were comfortable. The 4th person almost always struggles with finding a bed away from home comfortable. We were too busy during our stay to check out the pool or the computer center.
reviews.title: Graduation Weekend Great Hotel

reviews.text: The breakfast is a typical hotel breakfast. There were many choices but not the best eggs if you think you are getting eggs like at a restaurant. The breakfast area was clean & spacious.
reviews.title: Second time

reviews.text: I would highly recommend this hotel and will consider staying there again when we are in the area. It is conveniently located to a major highway, but not too close that you would notice any noise from the roadways as it is away from the exit far enough & additionally sits back in away from the road that it is located on. We chose this hotel due to the other recommendations on TripAdvisor so thank you to all those who recommended this prior to our stay!
reviews.title: Will DEFINATELY be back!!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed here for a wedding nearby and was given an early check in so we could get ready in time. The room we had was large with a king bed, sitting area with an upholstered chair, desk and wireless internet. The bathroom was also roomy with a large vanity counter. The included breakfast was good with some type of eggs and meat each day, cereals, fruit, make your own pancakes with a push of a button, and assorted muffins and breads, The cinnamon buns were warm and yummy. Everything was very clean and the staff was pleasant. Very nice 2 night stay, near the highway, but far enough to be quiet.
reviews.title: Good place to stay in the Albany area

reviews.text: We checked in on a Thursday afternoon, very easy check in, very friendly front desk staff. The hotel room was extremely clean with a very nice and large bathroom. The complimentary breakfast in the morning was fabulous. They make their own cinnamon rolls, fresh, which were very good and the aroma of cinnamon permeated the whole hotel! The breakfast included pancakes, a breakfast meat (different every morning), we had scrambled eggs on Friday and Western omelettes on Saturday. They had breads, pastries, cereals, fresh fruit, yogurt, assorted juices and milk, anything you could ask for was offered. There's coffee served in the lobby 24/7. We needed a cot, which was a full size bed, not your typical cot - very comfortable and worth the extra $$. The beds were wonderfully comfortable and you couldn't hear any noise coming from any of the other rooms. The grounds in the back of the hotel were gorgeous. They have a nice gazebo with a sitting area as well as a stone patio with a grill, if you're interested in cooking out. We didn't use the grill so I can't say if it's charcoal or propane. The hotel is located about 1 mile from the Crossgates Mall as well as SUNY, Albany. The parking is also included in the price, so there was no hidden fees like we found out about other hotels in the Albany area. There was a very nice and very clean indoor pool as well as a decent gym. All in all, I would stay here again and I wouldn't hesitate to recommend a stay here to anybody, you will not be disappointed.
reviews.title: Great location if visiting SUNY Albany

reviews.text: Some earlier guest had been smoking in our room. The hotel had obviously made an effort to remove the smell, but you could still smell it.
reviews.title: Fine hotel

reviews.text: When I mentioned it to the receptionist she offered to see if they could do something more about it, but as we were only staying one night, I told them we would be fine.
reviews.title: Great hotel, but could be more environmentally friendly
Nice hotel
reviews.text: The king bed was very comfortable, and they had a nice selection for breakfast.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: From the moment we walked in and were greeted by Nick, I knew we had arrived.
reviews.title: Excellent

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is nice, rooms clean and Nick!!! The next morning we went to the breakfast area and saw at least 2 dozen young men and families, our first thought was nothing left. There were two ladies bustling around refilling and cleaning as fast as possible. We had a nice breakfast and I made it a point to let them know what a great job they were doing. We have stayed at other hotels were when it is gone, its gone... I hope the hotel continues to hire and train great employees! Congratulations Holiday Inn Express!
reviews.title: JUST AMAZING

reviews.text: From the welcome at the front desk, to the excellent room to the most amazing breakfast this stay at this Holiday Inn was JUST AMAZING! Could not have been more satisfied and certainly the feeling they were glad we choose their location was a bonus.
reviews.title: The perfect hotel to stop overnight between New York and Montreal.

reviews.text: We broke the journey between NY and Montreal overnight at this hotel, and were pleasantly surprised by the high standard of room luxury and comfort here. The people at reception were very helpful, and the inside pool was an added bonus. Breakfast was top quality and the rooms were clean. We would choose this hotel again.
reviews.title: Great hotel for travel anywhere in the Albany area!

reviews.text: My family's stay at this Holiday Inn Express was fantastic! The rooms were perfectly sized and clean. Nice flat-screen HD TV was definitely a bonus and the wi-fi was decently fast for a hotel. The hotel staff was probably the friendliest I have seen and we truly appreciated their suggestions for where to go. Richard definitely gave us some great advice! Breakfast was delicious and the hours for it are great so everyone can eat. The snack shop being open 24 hours is also fantastic! We will definitely be staying at this hotel in the future!
reviews.title: Made my trip that much better

aka: Holiday Inn Express Albany-Western Ave University Hotel
description: Choose the Albany, NY hotel that is as smart as you are. We built this hotel in the right location, outfitted our rooms with up-to-date amenities, and hired a staff that delivers award-winning service. All together we provide a fresh, clean, comfortable stay with solid value. We know how important it is to be in the right spot in upstate New York. Our suburban hotel is located within 1 mile of the University at Albany, College of St. Rose, and Albany NanoTech. With easy access to Routes 87 and 90, this Albany hotel is the smart spot for a rest during your trip from New York City, Boston, Montreal or Syracuse. Only 4 miles from downtown Albany, you can visit the New York State Capitol, Empire State Plaza and Times Union Center.The Holiday Inn Express Albany offers our guests beautifully appointed guest rooms that welcome them to a traditional space. We have created a friendly environment designed with our guests' needs in mind.ADA accessibility is important to us. Be sure to let us know your needs and we will provide the right accessible room choice for you.
